name: Save new E-conomic customers to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new customer is created in E-conomic, Make will automatically add that customer to a new row in a Google Sheet spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12g3Io4Pti0IptkDKHLMAyxnVIi2q0iJgwCfzzgHMV2M/edit?usp=sharing).
